feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 10:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -30.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow near the Rockies overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow near the Rockies in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
